net.mobid.codetraq.utils
Class LogService

java.lang.Object
  java.util.logging.Logger
      net.mobid.codetraq.utils.LogService

public class LogService
extends java.util.logging.Logger

Custom logging class for CodeTraq. It is also capable to write to a log file.

writeLog

public static void writeLog(java.util.logging.Level level,
                            java.lang.Throwable t)
Records an Exception to the log file. The message is formatted to include the time and the cause of the Exception.

Parameters:
level - - Exception Level
t - - the Exception itself

writeMessage

public static void writeMessage(java.lang.String message)
Records a message to the log file. The message is formatted to include the time.

Parameters:
message - - text to write into the log file
